review: I bought the Google Chromecast to try to connect my TV & the internet.To some degree, I have to say the Chromecast is a success.Youtube, & some other web sites work great, & you can customize the Chromecast a little.Using one of our computers, there are a number of web sites we can use w/ the TV, which is great.BUT; its not really able to 'interact' w/ the web, the way most of us do w/ a computer or a tablet.I'm still looking for a way to surf the 'net, do email, news, & the other stuff I do online, because the Chromecast is really pretty limited in what you can do w/ it.Its works well for what it does, it just doesn't do enough for me.My bad, I'll keep looking for a device that well let me access the web on my TV.For videos, & sites that focus on them, its great, but that's about all it can do.
